generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Air Quality Index: What to do when the air quality is bad in your area," you can expect to read about the Air Quality Index (AQI) and its significance in assessing air pollution levels. Additionally, it may discuss the health implications of different AQI levels and suggest resources for monitoring air quality in real-time.
